item.title: Maid Cafe on Electric Street
item.description:
Title: Maid Cafe on Electric Street
Genre: Adventure , Casual , Indie , RPG , Simulation
Developer: Adventurer's Tavern
Publisher: PLAYISM
Franchise: PLAYISM
Release Date: Nov 17, 2024




About This Game

"Um, would you be interested in becoming the new manager of the cafe?"

Fuwa Fuwa Cafe—a maid cafe tucked away in a quiet part of Nipponbashi, and where a wonderful encounter is about to take place...

You, the protagonist, quit your job at an extremely toxic workplace and find yourself at a run-down maid cafe, where a cute maid named Shiro works.

At first, you only agree to become the new manager because it conveniently met all your urgent needs, but soon the colorful maids Miyu, Favna, and Honoka join in. And as you spend time with them and meet the people of Electric Street, both you and the cafe will gradually liven up once more.

Maid Cafe on Electric Street is a story-focused adventure game where you enjoy daily life at Fuwa Fuwa Cafe. Make yourself a cup of coffee, relax, and immerse yourself in a heartwarming story.

Main Characters & Voice Cast

Shiro (VA: Ikumi Hasegawa)

"But now that you're here, it'll probably be fine! Yes!"

A maid who loves Fuwa Fuwa Cafe. A huge otaku for anime and video games, she talks really fast when she’s gushing about the things she loves, and often splurges on merch without thinking whenever she visits an anime shop. A little clumsy, but works hard every day to become the cute maid she’s always wanted to be.

Notable Roles: Masaki (Mayonaka Punch), Lene Aurousseau (I'm in Love with the Villainess), Ikuyo Kita (Bocchi the Rock!), Vladilena Milizé (86)

Miyu (VA: Ayasa Itou)

"Thanks for hanging out with me today, Manager! ☆"

A game otaku and gyaru with a big appetite. Loves both eating and cooking, and apparently really enjoys serving her cooking to customers at Fuwa Fuwa Cafe. Is actually Shiro's friend on the online game Magic Angel, so they knew each other before actually meeting in real life.

Notable Roles: Angelico Fra (Delico’s Nursery), Kaoruko Hanayagi (Revue Starlight), Arisa Ichigaya (BanG Dream! Girls Band Party!)

Favna (VA: Sayumi Suzushiro)

"I am the Slayer of the False God, the Queen of the Kingdom of Darkness, the All-Seeing Oracle, the Guardian of All Dreams—"

A mysterious girl dressed in gothic Lolita fashion. Speaks in riddles and demands the protagonist become her familiar. She sometimes accidentally drops the edgy act when she's taken by surprise though, so maybe she's just got a serious case of chuunibyou...?

Notable Roles: Ayako (The Elusive Samurai), Nijika Ijichi (Bocchi the Rock!), Satono Crown (Uma Musume Pretty Derby), Kylie (The Magnificent Kotobuki)

Honoka (VA: Yui Ishikawa)

"Ya want a thrivin' business? That there sounds like a job for our shrine!"

A girl with a Kansaiben dialect who works as a shrine maiden at her family shrine. Practically in charge of the shrine, she is reliable and very good at handling money! Is actually a doujin author...?

Notable Roles: Elise (Doctor Elise), Saku Fukuzawa (The Masterful Cat Is Depressed Again Today), Violet Evergarden (Violet Evergarden), Mikasa Ackerman (Attack on Titan)

Daily Life with the Four Maids of Fuwa Fuwa Cafe

As the manager of Fuwa Fuwa, you’ll live in Nipponbashi, Osaka and spend time with your favorite maid... or maids. Go shopping, watch a movie, go for karaoke, buy a present for a special someone... What you choose to do will affect the ending of the story.

Of course, you want to always be doing what's best for the cafe. So maybe you should do something about the ominous voices coming from the shrine next to the cafe, or you could get the whole town involved in a large-scale campaign to bring in even more business. All sorts of events await you and the maids!


Support Your Maid Cafe Employees as the Manager!

Your most important job as the manager is, of course, to manage the cafe and the maids.

First, you’ll have to allocate work to your maids. Shiro loves serving customers, and Miyu’s a great chef... Make sure each girl is assigned the right job!

While the cafe is open, you can help out by serving customers and cheering the maids on. And with your hard-earned money, you can go shopping, eat out, or buy merch or capsule toys for your otaku collection.

Make Fuwa Fuwa the most popular cafe in town to enjoy Nipponbashi to the fullest!

Special Brews for Special Customers!

Sometimes, special customers will visit Fuwa Fuwa. Pay attention to their needs and serve them the perfect coffee! You can find coffee recipes hidden all around Electric Street.

Explore the town, collect recipes, and serve the drinks of your customers’ dreams, and maybe one day they might offer you their service as well...?

The Stunning Sights of Nipponbashi

Visit stores you can find in the real Nipponbashi, such as Surugaya, Sofmap, Dragon Star, Super Potato, and Karaoke Rainbow, among the many others we've collaborated with.

Go shopping by yourself or go on dates with the maids and enjoy life in otaku heaven. But don't stay out too late; you still have a cafe to run!

Collectable Capsule Toys

If you've been to the real Nipponbashi, you'll know that there are capsule vending machines all over the area. In this game, you can also try to collect your favorite capsule toy series and experience that unique gacha thrill of not knowing what you're getting. Keep cranking those machines until you've collected them all!

Other than capsule toys, there's tons of items for you to collect, like video games, books, and figures. You can also decorate your room and watch as your collections reach completion!

Collaborating with Real Stores in Nipponbashi... and Other Indies!

Since Maid Cafe on Electric Street is a leisurely maid cafe adventure set in Nipponbashi, Osaka, we have collaborated with several stores that you can find both in-game and in real-life Nipponbashi! Of course, you can shop and eat at these places just like you can at the real ones.

What’s more, we have also collaborated with several indie games. You can collect merchandise of different indie games by buying them from capsule toy machines and stores!

Nipponbashi Store Collaborators

  • 1904/1904

  • Osaka Nipponbashi Takoyaki Tokushin

  • KARAOKE RAINBOW

  • The old man's best swing

  • Game Tanteidan RETRO TV GAME REVIVAL

  • JUNGLE

  • Surugaya

  • Swallowtail

  • Super Potato

  • Sofmap

  • Tsutenkaku Tower

  • TOGETSUYA

  • Dragon Star

  • Nipponbashi Shopping Association

  • Mugen Malatang

  • maidreamin

Indie Game Collaborators

  • Marfusha: Sentinel Girls

  • VA-11 Hall-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action

  • and more!

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10 64 bit
    • Processor: 2.50GHz
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: HD4400
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 screen resolution
* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

item.title: Bioweaver
item.description:
Title: Bioweaver
Genre: Action , Indie , RPG
Developer: Emprom Game , Wild Kid Games
Publisher: Emprom Game
Franchise: Bio Series
Release Date: Nov 15, 2024




About This Game



In a mysterious underground laboratory, dangerous creatures have escaped. The road to the surface is blocked by many obstacles, but top scientists never complain about the environment. The organs and genes of unknown creatures can be your power. Make good use of them and create yourself a path of flesh and blood.



Use simple programming logic to build organ links. The skill building process is highly visualized and can be easily debugged.



The game includes hundreds of organs with different functions. Each organ can also be mutated to obtain additional affixes which can further generate more unpredictable changes.


The difficulty of the game can be automatically adjusted to the progress of the game. After completing the main acts, there are still more difficult challenges, more modes and content to explore.



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10 64bit
    • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8350
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870
    • Storage: 2 GB available space

Linux

    Minimum:
    • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8350
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870
    • Storage: 2 GB available space

item.title: Fish Idle 2: Underwater Mystery
item.description:
Title: Fish Idle 2: Underwater Mystery
Genre: Adventure , Casual , Indie
Developer: Multicast
Publisher: MulticastGames
Release Date: Nov 15, 2024




About This Game

Crush in your rainboots and hop into your boat! We are going fishing in Fish Idle 2: Underwater Mystery, a unique idle fishing arcade featuring smooth graphics and intuitive mechanics. We have no time to swing a fishing rod, so let’s streamline the process!

SIMPLE AND EASY FISHING


Let’s start with the basics. It’s all about automation: fish start biting as soon as you approach them, and resource indicators keep you informed while you focus on managing your Fish Kingdom effectively. The game offers advantageous upgrades to enhance your idle fishing abilities, helping you become a true fish tycoon. You’ll still need to steer your boat to chase fish schools and avoid obstacles, so don’t get too distracted by your economic prowess!

UPGRADE YOUR FISH KINGDOM


Once your hull is full, it’s time to get upgraded! Improvements in fishing speed let you catch more and rarer species, while increased storage capacity allows you to hold more catches in your boat. Boost your boat’s speed and defense for impact protection, and enhance your fishing rods to cast multiple lines at once. It’s all about maximizing your gains in the most efficient way, so you’ll have to use your head to figure out the best way to success!

MAKE IT BIG


Just like in real life, becoming a fish tycoon involves various ways to profit from your catches. The Idle Fish Farm allows you to invest and get passive income, while the Black Market lets you upgrade your Fish Kingdoms beyond OSHA standards. The Bots Shop enables you to hire hunter, fisher, and cargo ships to fish and deliver catch for you, boosting your income. If day trading is your thing, there is a Currency Exchange that has some special benefits. Tax fraud is not a crime, it’s an obligation if you want to make it big.

NOW GO FISH


Get ready to dive into the Fish Kingdoms and become the ultimate fish tycoon in Fish Idle 2: Underwater Mystery!
Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: windows 10
    • Processor: Core I3
    • Graphics: no
    • Sound Card: -
    • VR Support: no
    Recommended:
    • OS: windows 10
    • Processor: Core I3
    • Graphics: no
    • Sound Card: -
    • VR Support: no

item.title: Great God Grove
item.description:
Title: Great God Grove
Genre: Adventure , Casual , Indie
Developer: LimboLane
Publisher: LimboLane , Fellow Traveller
Franchise: Great God Grove
Release Date: Nov 15, 2024




About This Game



Once in a generation, the gods come together to postpone the apocalypse. But this time, the god of communication started a bunch of godly fights and then went awol. With the sky splitting and the gods in disarray, who's gonna join the Bizzyboys to help SAVE DA WORLD FROM A-POCKY-LIPS???


As the gods’ mail-carrier, suck up and launch speech bubbles to solve puzzles.




Deliver messages to chat, flirt, or hurt their feelings.




The god of TEAMWORK? The god of LOVE SONGS? Drain it, who’s in charge around here…?

You may be ready for:

  • A big colorful world to explore
  • Third and first-person gameplay
  • Weird people. Weirder gods

But are you also ready for:

  • Godly crushes?
  • Pumpkin fights??
  • Puppets cooking???

AND YOU’RE NOT READY FOR:

  • Grovekeeping!
  • Godbossing!!
  • THE END OF THE WORLD AS WE KNOW IT!!!!!





LimboLane is a creative duo making silly games that squish and bounce, comprised of designer Day Lane and animator Yugo Limbo. They have a love for the kitschy, the surreal, and the utterly bizarre. Their nod-and-shake adventure game Smile For Me was self-published on Steam in 2019 and re-released for consoles in 2023.



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11 +
    • Processor: x64 architecture
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • DirectX: Version 10
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

item.title: 420BLAZEIT 2: GAME OF THE YEAR -=Dank Dreams and Goated Memes=- [#wow/11 Like and Subscribe] Poggerz Edition
item.description:
Title: 420BLAZEIT 2: GAME OF THE YEAR -=Dank Dreams and Goated Memes=- [#wow/11 Like and Subscribe] Poggerz Edition
Genre: Action , Indie
Developer: Normal Wholesome Games
Publisher: Normal Wholesome Games
Release Date: Nov 14, 2024




About This Game

The illuminati have stolen all the world’s memes! You’re an ex secret-service agent turned to a peaceful life of painting, but now you’re needed one more time to fight back. lets be real its an FPS game that's a sequel to the original you know exactly what to expect why are u still reading this don't let ur memes be dreams

featuring a state of da art creamy meme slider to adjust ur meme levels to your liking. this took a team of 483 developers 7 years to build making this now a AAAAA game get rekt scrubs

Many gr9 moments:

  • 13 levels of neuron-obliterating fun!

  • High-security prison outbreak where you’ll stop along the way to do some laundry

  • Speed your convertible through zombie-infested streets because yes you’re a badass but you’re also late for work

  • Blow up a helicopter

  • Infiltrate Area 51 to stop a world-threatening event planned by the Illuminati

  • … aliens

  • And more!!!1!!

Headshot with your favs:

  • shitty pistol

  • big D ;)

  • goated shotty (only if ur cool)

  • awwwp uwu

  • rip rocket

  • Throwable spliff aka doobie aka joint aka blunt

  • Gun that shoots farts (becuz f*** it why not)

  • AND MORE!!!!

420BLAZEIT 2 features a healthy amount of IMAGINARY “consumables” that grant you cool powers so you can truly 420 BLAZE IT 360 NO SCOPE IT like an EPICC GAMER(™). 13 levels x 27 weapons x sherk + dhomas the dank engine = 420% BIGGER AND BETTER than the original!!1!

“This game changed my entire life before it i had a respectable job and family now im a leet gamer gettin 480 headshoots no scope blaze it every day. 10/10” - this could be u!!!

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

420BLAZEIT 2 contains violence and drug usage. It’s not appropriate for young audiences.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel i5-4670 / AMD FX4350
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Geforce GT1030 / Radeon RX550
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 16 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 720p Low-Med Settings, Producing 40+ FPS
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 11
    • Processor: Intel i7-8700 / AMD 2700x
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Geforce 2060 / Radeon RX5700
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 16 GB available space
